name: The Brave and the Bounteous
description: Heroes come in all sizes! Help our knight escape the room, avoiding the gaze of giant roaming lizards, and save her Majesty! A small but tricky stealth game with very charming 3-D characters, awesome music, and a detailed isometric background. Interact with the room in surprising ways and take advantage of the ability to rotate it for a full view from all sides.
